750e224c-d504-4641-ba09-9c0a698781c6.description: make your display from a special block, the block must be positioned horizontally while using the tool (otherwise an error message will be displayed) then weld the resulting display. the connection point should be located in the upper left corner
750e224c-d504-4641-ba09-9c0a698781c6.title: display initializer

4a7bd6e6-a48d-4932-8233-9dd6eb7386c8.description: build a horizontal display shape from this block on lift. then use a special tool to make the display. weld the resulting display. the connection point should be located in the upper left corner
4a7bd6e6-a48d-4932-8233-9dd6eb7386c8.title: stretchable display
